setup: [[ -f "$JEAN_ROOT_PATH/.env" ]] && cp "$JEAN_ROOT_PATH/.env" . ; mkdir -p .claude && [[ -f "$JEAN_ROOT_PATH/.claude/settings.local.json" ]] && cp "$JEAN_ROOT_PATH/.claude/settings.local.json" .claude/settings.local.json ; npm ci --ignore-scripts && npm run build
run: PORT=$(p=2500; while lsof -i :$p >/dev/null 2>&1; do p=$((p+1)); done; echo $p); MCP_TRANSPORT=http MCP_PORT=$PORT npm run dev
